column4: you should also be able to squeeze the text vertically using those buttons so it all fits
monitors nowadays are not set up to run in text mode by default but you should be able to get a usable display by playing with the buttons
if I do that, won't it mess of the configure for all of the machines running on the monitor? I am using a KVM switch

generally monitors have different sets of settings for different video modes, so when you switch the KVM the monitor will switch to a different mode for the next display - but this depends on your monitor, you will have to try it and see
